result.markdown:
---
title: "Checklists"
echo: false
code-fold: true
---



::: {#tbl-packing .cell tbl-cap='Packing List for EC Site Visits' tbl-colwidths='[40,60]'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
|Item                              |Notes                                                                               |
|:---------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Vehicle and Site Keys             |                                                                                    |
|Field Laptop                      |Charge overnight & bring all necesary calbes plus DC>AC power converter             |
|USB Sticks                        |One per site - ensure its empty and formattedS                                      |
|Wildlife Camera SD card           |+ 8 AA batteries per camera as needed                                               |
|Cleaning Supplies                 |Wipes + washer fluid as needed                                                      |
|Desiccant                         |4-5 bags / site                                                                     |
|Water Table Probe                 |Yellow manual probe from lab                                                        |
|First Aid Kit                     |Red first aid kit kept in ponderosa lab                                             |
|Water & Snacks                    |                                                                                    |
|Waders/Boots                      |Waders necessary at BB sites except in summer - Boots are usually okay at DSM & RBM |
|Spare socks                       |as needed during winter                                                             |
|Torch or deicing fluids for locks |as needed during winter                                                             |
|**Site Specific**                 |                                                                                    |
|*DSM & RMB*                       |                                                                                    |
|Tool kit                          |                                                                                    |
|7700 calibration shroud           |                                                                                    |
|*BB Sites*                        |                                                                                    |
|Fire exthingusher & water spray   |only needed during fire season                                                      |
|                                  |                                                                                    |
|                                  |                                                                                    |
:::
:::

::: {#tbl-on-site .cell tbl-cap='Tasks on EC Site Visits' tbl-colwidths='[40,60]'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
|Task                      |Notes                                                                                                                 |
|:-------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Clean IRGAs as Needed     |See the [Cleaning Page](Cleaning.qmd) for details                                                                     |
|Calibrate IRGAs as Needed |See the [Calibration Page](Calibration.qmd) for details                                                               |
|Swap USB in 7550          |Press eject and wait for light to turn off before removal.  Ensure light is blinking after inserting new stick.       |
|Swap desiccant            |One per box                                                                                                           |
|Refill 7700 washer fluid  |take note of fluid supply on site                                                                                     |
|Check radiometers         |Clean as needed                                                                                                       |
|Check rain gauge          |Unscrew top and clean funnel if clogged                                                                               |
|Check wildlife camera     |Swap SD card and replace batteries (8AA) as needed                                                                    |
|Measure water table depth |Take manual reading with probe record level and date/time.  Record on google drive under site\Flux-tower\met_data\WTH |
:::
:::
